question: I have been a type 2 diabetic for nearly three years .I am not taking any medication ,just diet controll.   Its been a year since my last diabetic review .Yesterday i had a fasting  blood tests ,so that i can have my diabetic review with the nurse..For that last couple of months i have been having an irratation in my vagina .I have tried differnt cremes such as canestan ,vagisil and also plain youghurt . Yesterday after having a bath i looked at the offending part with a mirror ,and was suprised to see a very reddish patch inside .Is this normal please?
title: Can diabetes cause a sore  vagina?
